content: Thin metal reciprocating saw blades Reciprocating saw blade for cutting 2-6 mm (1/16 - 1/4) thin metal ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Saw blades- - - ### FEATURES:Features Economical bimetal blades optimized for cutting thin metal plate, heavy pipes, metal structures etc. Thin kerf for more flexibility – the ideal blade for flush cuts Multiple lengths available – choosing the right length based on the shape of your workpiece can increase comfort and efficiency Applications Rough, faster cuts through thin metal components (2-6 mm or 1/16 - 1/4) Flush cuts Cutting sheet metal Cutting pipes and profiles Cutting conduits ### TECHNICAL DATA: Product Class: Standard Shank: 1/2 in universal shank Teeth per inch: 18 Technical Data | Product Class | Standard | Shank | 1/2 in universal shank | Teeth per inch | 18 | Blade features | Economic, Flexible ### ITEMS- 2099399 - Recip. saw blade P 6 18 (5) metal - Package Size 5 pc - 2099352 - Recip. saw blade P 6 18 (50) metal - Package Size 50 pc - 3889038 - Metal Recip blade P 15 18 (200 pcs) - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 200x Recip. saw blade P 6 18 (50) metal - 2099400 - Recip. saw blade P 8 18 (5) metal - Package Size 5 pc - 2099353 - Recip. saw blade P 8 18 (50) metal - Package Size 50 pc - 3889036 - Metal Recip blade P 20 18 (200 pcs) - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 200x Recip. saw blade P 8 18 (50) metal - 2099402 - Recip. saw blade P 12 18 (5) metal - Package Size 5 pc - 2099355 - Recip. saw blade P 12 18 (50) metal - Package Size 50 pc
